
recordStart( fpath )
    Starts saving commands to a specified file path.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fpath: string
        File path.

    Returns
    -------
    id: number
        Record identifier.

    Examples
    --------
    > var id = recordStart( './path/to/file.js' );
    > 1 + 1
    2
    > 'foo'
    'foo'
    > recordStop( id );
